        Push info by UDP protocol to server port for physical machine reports

        hostName - : current hostname
        userName - : name of current user on machine

        public boolean pushInfoEXE(java.lang.String hostName,
                  long executionCode,
                  ExecutionStateEnum state,
                  java.lang.String messageExecution)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Push info by UDP protocol to server port for executions reports
        Parameters:
        hostName - : current hostname
        executionCode - : execution code in server
        state - : last state for execution
        messageExecution - : Short message with description about state
        Returns:
        Starts and configures an execution. This method must be used by other methods to configure, start and schedule an execution
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
